properties.description: This impeccably designed super luxury house in Battaramulla offers a grand living experience, featuring four fully air-conditioned and furnished bedrooms.The residence is equipped with a dual hot and cold water supply system, sourced from boththe main road and a well. Comprising four spacious en-suite bedrooms, pantry, kitchen, and visitor's bathroom/toilet, the house exudes sophistication.

This newly listed super luxury house in Athurugiriya presents an unparalleled living experience with its exquisite features. Boasting three fully air-conditioned and furnished bedrooms, the residence encompasses a  sophisticated design that includes a spacious living room, sitting room, family room, prayer area, dining room, and a well-equipped kitchen.

These furnished 3-bedroom apartments in Havelock City offer a luxurious and convenient living experience. Each unit is brand new and fully air-conditioned, featuring attached bathrooms, a modern kitchen,and hot water facilities.The property also boasts outstanding amenities, including a swimming pool, fully equipped gyms,newly constructed Kid's Play Area

Experience the epitome of comfort and tranquility with this newly available villa for rent in Mirissa. Boasting four bedrooms and four bathrooms across a single floor, the villa offers a serene living space. The property is fully furnished with high-quality electrical items and hot water geysers. The meticulous timber works add character and warmth to the luxurious ambiance, creating an inviting atmosphere.

Indulge in the epitome of opulence with this luxury villa nestled in the heart of Sigiriya. Boasting five bedrooms across two floors and set on an expansive 95-perch land, the property offers a lavish living experience. The air-conditioned rooms, each with private bathrooms.A fully equipped commercial-grade kitchen caters to culinary enthusiasts, ensuring a gourmet paradise for residents.

This commercial building in Dehiwala presents a lucrative investment opportunity with its strategic design and practical features. The two-story structure is meticulously designed, with a spacious tiled hall and small toilet on the ground floor, while the first floor encompasses two tiled rooms, a tiny balcony, and an open floor area designed for potential expansion.

This three-story commercial building in Bambalapitiya offers a prime opportunity for businesses seeking a strategic location with top-notch facilities. Priced at LKR 200,000 per month, the property includes essential features such as three bathrooms, fully air-conditioned spaces. With electricity and water costs payable based on actual meter usage, the building provides flexibility and cost efficiency.
